prompt: He had to die because he loved tomato soup.
initialStory: Story: A young drug dealer wanted to smuggle a bag of heroin from Norway to Germany. To not get caught he decided to swallow the bag of heroin and smuggle it inside of his stomach. On airport he ate a tomato soup, which was so hot, that it melted the plastic bag and the heroin got out. Having so much heroin in his stomach, he died on the plane due to overdose.
